reviewText: Jack Kornfield provides a simple, yet understanding approach to meditation. Though it doesn't state it, his presentation provides insight for the experienced person along with basic instruction for a beginner. Unlike some presentations that only give instruction on what to do, Jack Kornfield walks you through the meditation step-by-step, providing useful tools and methods to practice in order to improve your meditation time. I really enjoyed his simple approach and sincerity. This can be used over and over again for any meditation session not just as an instructional tool that is learned and then layed to the side. I highly recommend it !!
